command.text: declare @ngay_ks varchar(8) select @ngay_ks = convert(varchar(8), ngay_ks, 112) from dmstt select 'this._lockedDate = ''' + @ngay_ks + ''';active$Filter$SocialInsuranceBenefitsEntry(this);' as message return

declare @baseSalary numeric(19, 2), @date smalldatetime select @date = cast(replace(str(@nam, 4), ' ', '0') + replace(str(@ky, 2), ' ', '0') + '01' as smalldatetime) select @baseSalary = luong_tt from hrdmlttc where ngay_hl = (select max(ngay_hl) from hrdmlttc where ngay_hl <= @date) select '' as field, '' as message, 'this.grid._baseSalary = ' + rtrim(isnull(@baseSalary, 0)) + ';' as script
